mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, user_id, category_id, state, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{state}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, user_id as userId, category_id as categoryId, state, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM board WHERE state = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, state = #{state}, user_id = #{userId}, category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE board SET state = 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND state = 0
